short_summary: Multiple supplies of Goods and services
full_summary:
##Government Tender Announcement: Multiple Victoria-Class Spares

###Tender Details

**Reference Number:** cb-6010-56872564
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-230858/B
**Publication Date:** June 2, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** June 22, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** August 24, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** February 29, 2024

###Procurement Overview

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for multiple Victoria-Class Spares, including Master Unit Cased, Master Unit Uncased, Circuit Card Assembly, Connector, Antenna, and Cable Assembly Radio Frequency. The delivery locations specified are CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.

**Detailed Requirements**

| Item | Quantity | Unit of Issue | Delivery Location |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Master Unit Cased | 6 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| Master Unit Cased | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| Master Unit Uncased | 1 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| Master Unit Uncased | 9 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| Circuit Card Assembly | 35 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| Circuit Card Assembly | 20 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| Connector | 3 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| Antenna | 2 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| Antenna | 5 | EA | CFB Halifax |
| Cable Assembly Radio Frequency | 4 | EA | CFB Esquimalt |
| Cable Assembly Radio Frequency | 4 | EA | CFB Halifax |

###Key Requirements

* Bidders may propose equivalent or substitute products. Please indicate the brand name, model, and/or part number, and National Coding (NCAGE) code offered.
* This procurement is subject to the Controlled Goods Program, as per the Defence Production Act.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

###Submission Instructions

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Please see the attached documents for further information.

###Contact Information

Aïcha Diallo
aicha.diallo@forces.gc.ca
(000) 000-0000
